entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning.
